report.title: The Safe Drug...Right..?
report.author: Berto
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I was with a friend last night.. yes last night. We were both depressed so we wanted to ' smoke some dope.' It is a common misconception in my school (I'm a junior in hs) that Weed is a safe drug and just numbs you. true right? /n /n COMPLETELY WRONG /n we Lit our bong thinking yeah we're gona get wasteD!! fuck the world we're gonna get wasted...forget our problems!! So we smoke and smoked. About 2 minutes later, I started seeing the moon from his door... and it looked like it had rings around it. I then immediately started feeling the effects. I Saw Christopher columbus, and then I Saw Jesus on a beach walking with me, and then I saw a ring and then I Was on the moon. I then immediately fell down to the ground. I woke up 5 seconds later and started screaming, ' THE DONUTS ARE IN THE OVEN.' I then immediatelye felt my heart pounding out of my chest. I thought I was going to die. My heart was pumping a million times faster then my head which was spinning. I went to my friends basement tried to chill and went home. /n /n It is now 10 hours later and I am half normal and still half high... what can I say about weed? /n /n 1.- its not a safe drug, neither is any drug sold on a black market, and I certaintely dont know if what I'm getting is laced or not, because lets be honest, drug dealers dont care about my health /n /n 2.- My weed was most likely laced with Hallucigens bc my effects were not supposed to be felt with weed. All i know is I'm never touching this shit again. It made me want to die I kept asking my friend, I feel like I'm going to die. what the hell am I doing. I didnt know anything I Was saying and I wanted to die feeling like I was in a hole of non reality and I would never get back to reality. For once, reality seemed like something nice to me. /n /n all I know is I'm never touching this shit again, I dont know what is in it, but I am never ever touching this again. It is garbage and I will never use any other drug on the market. I had a seizure immediately after I woke up and couldnt control my muscles? Weed so safe? Think again...
